update red_envelope
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
red_count = #{redCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_money = #{redMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_scope = #{redScope,jdbcType=INTEGER},

use_start_time = #{useStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
use_end_time = #{useEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where red_id = #{redId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
